intro: Urostigma muelleri, commonly known as the Mueller's bladderpod, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Papaveraceae, which includes poppies and related genera. The plant is characterized by its erect, slender stem and small, pale green leaves. Its flowers are typically greenish-yellow and appear in late winter to early spring. Urostigma muelleri is often found in sandy or gravelly soils in arid and semi-arid regions.
